version_description:
External monitor display support for new 3rd Generation iPad Pro
Ability to export 4K video
Performance and stability improvements

External monitor display support for new 3rd Generation iPad Pro
Ability to export 4K video
Performance and stability improvements

Adobe Premiere Rush (1.2) now has speed, in addition to feature enhancements and important fixes—recommended for all users

New: Slo-mo and fast-mo, now available!

Get moving! Slow down, speed up, and do everything in between. With the latest release, now you can re-time video and audio clips right within Premiere Rush. Want to highlight impactful moments in your video and enhance your storytelling? Get started today.

We can’t wait to see what you create!

Adobe Premiere Rush (1.2) now has speed, in addition to feature enhancements and important fixes—recommended for all users

New: Slo-mo and fast-mo, now available!

Get moving! Slow down, speed up, and do everything in between. With the latest release, now you can re-time video and audio clips right within Premiere Rush. Want to highlight impactful moments in your video and enhance your storytelling? Get started today.

We can’t wait to see what you create!

Easily use the native cut, copy, and paste feature on your iPhone or iPad when editing title text directly in the preview monitor.
Keyboard shortcut support now available! Use your Bluetooth keyboard with Rush and make use of new keyboard commands for iPhone or iPad.

Easily use the native cut, copy, and paste feature on your iPhone or iPad when editing title text directly in the preview monitor.
Keyboard shortcut support now available! Use your Bluetooth keyboard with Rush and make use of new keyboard commands for iPhone or iPad.

Fixed issue where preferred languages were not installed after selection
New title templates added to "More Titles" section
Performance and stability improvements
Fixed a bug where PNGs would display as a black box without transparency.

Exciting news: You can share to TikTok
Share to TikTok! With the latest release, we’ve updated Premiere Rush to include the ability to directly share to TikTok from within the app. Not shooting vertical videos? No problem. You can change the aspect ratio to 9:16 with the click of a button and share to TikTok.

Exciting news: You can share to TikTok
Share to TikTok!
With the latest release, we’ve updated Premiere Rush to include the ability to directly share to TikTok from within the app.
Not shooting vertical videos? No problem.
You can change the aspect ratio to 9:16 with the click of a button and share to TikTok.

Minor UI changes.
Performance and stability improvements
A/B test framework update

New in this release: Separate audio! Take the audio from a video clip and create an audio-only clip that you can move around independently. Give it a try by pressing and holding on a video clip with audio, then select “Separate Audio” to create an audio clip.

23 new soundtracks have been added, totaling 33 music tracks available.

It’s now easier than ever to tap and drag the handles on sliders.

On iPad, we’ve exposed the redo button, so it’s easier to tap.

Support for more languages: Italian, Russian, Portuguese, and Simplified Chinese.

This update also includes important bug fixes and feature enhancements.

New in this release: Separate audio! Take the audio from a video clip and create an audio-only clip that you can move around independently. Give it a try by pressing and holding on a video clip with audio, then select “Separate Audio” to create an audio clip.
23 new soundtracks have been added, totaling 33 music tracks available.
It’s now easier than ever to tap and drag the handles on sliders.
On iPad, we’ve exposed the redo button, so it’s easier to tap.
Support for more languages: Italian, Russian, Portuguese, and Simplified Chinese.
This update also includes important bug fixes and feature enhancements.

Improved export and share to social workflow.

Improved color panel usability: See a holistic overview of color adjustments applied to a clip

Improved title panel: New control allows you to easily switch between title layers.

Slider improvement: In addition to zoom and pinch, you can now tap on the value and add a number to adjust length of slider-highlighted clip.

Updated message to confirm when exported video is saved to camera roll.

This update also includes important bug fixes and feature enhancements.

Want to share your videos on Instagram and Facebook? Now you can automatically resize your projects to 4:5 aspect ratio. Once aspect ratio is selected, media will automatically be resized to fill the frame.

Exciting news! You can now capture from any back camera available on your device right into the app. Choose "Take a Video or Photo", then tap the lens icon to switch. Please note: You must have iOS 13 to use this feature.

Looking to access media files stored on your device or different cloud services? Now you can import media from the Files app directly from the media browser in the app.

• Editing Text: We've added an iOS native text editing field just above your keyboard, allowing you to move your cursor and highlight text with ease. Try it out with any title!
• Automatic Font Substitution: If you type Japanese, Chinese, or Korean (CJK) characters in a font that doesn’t support CJK, it will automatically switch to a supported font. Say goodbye to those [X]s!
• Auto-Fill: Clips automatically fill the frame upon import—no more black bars! Plus, Fit and Fill is also available in the Transform Panel to quickly transform your clips.
• Duplicate Projects: With so many social media sites (and so little time), of course you want to be able to create multiple versions of projects quickly and easily. Say no more! You can Duplicate Projects from the project browser, and it will also duplicate any media associated with it.

Pan and Zoom: Our first iteration of this feature lets you zoom in and out of an image with one click. More flexibility to come, including start and end points.

Auto Reframe: Enjoy automatic reframing of the most important parts of your clips for different aspect ratios.

Now you can easily browse all Rush graphics, including titles, transitions, and overlays, from the + button

GIF performance has been improved!

Trackpad usage is now supported, allowing you to scroll and zoom the timeline. For iOS 13, pointer effects are now supported as well.

New audio Choose from hundreds of royalty-free soundtracks, sound effects, and loops. Plus, enjoy a brand new browsing experience.
Take your pick with our new transitions: Push, Slide, and Wipe
Pan and Zoom: You can now apply this feature to multiple images at once
Graphics: Level-up your content with our new motion graphics templates

Pan and Zoom: Want to apply Pan and Zoom to multiple images? Now you can with our multi-select tool.
Rush is now available in 5 new languages: Dutch, Polish, Swedish, Turkish and Traditional Chinese.
Pan and Zoom: You can now select the start and end points of this effect on still images, as well as change the scale and position as needed.

Pan and Zoom: Easily switch between start and end boxes using the Go to Start/End button

V Flip/H Flip: You can now apply the flip and mirror feature horizontally or vertically to video clips, images, stickers and overlays

V Flip/H Flip: You can now apply the flip and mirror feature horizontally or vertically to video clips, images, stickers and overlays
Offline Audio: Already used audio is now available in the audio browser when offline
Sound Effects: Hundreds of new sound effects to choose from

Color presets: Choose from 24 new clean and cinematic color presets
Color settings: Easily apply your color settings from 1 clip to all clips by using the "Apply to All" button

YouTube: Export your video and share directly to YouTube from Rush
Adjustments: Reset for Color, Audio, and Transform now resets all adjustments
Context menu: Tap a clip in the timeline to split, duplicate, and delete
Languages: Premiere Rush is now available in Czech, Danish, Finnish, and Norwegian Bokmal
Languages: Premiere Rush is now available in Czech, Danish, Finnish, and Norwegian Bokmal
